2025-09-21T09:10:00.CONTENT_EN: Amber Rainstorm Warning Signal is in force. Due to wet weather and slippery roads, Transport Department appeals motorists and the commuters to: i. plan the journey in advance; ii. allow more traveling time; iii. drive with extra care and patience; and iv. take heed of traffic situation particularly at busy junctions with obstructive views.
2025-09-21T09:10:00.CONTENT_CN: 黃色暴雨警告信號現已生效，天雨路滑，運輸署呼籲駕駛人士及乘客須: i.提早計劃行程路線； ii.預留充裕時間出門； iii.小心駕駛及保持忍讓；及 iv.留意交通情況，特别在視線受阻的繁忙路口。

2025-09-21T09:53:00.CONTENT_EN: Tsui Wah Ferry Service (H. K. ) Limited Due to mechanical failure, the kaito ferry service of Sai Kung to Kau Sai Village & High Island will be delayed. The actual departure time will be announced later.
2025-09-21T09:53:00.CONTENT_CN: 翠華船務（香港）有限公司 因機件故障，西貢至滘西村及糧船灣的街渡服務開出時間將會延誤，實際開出時間將會再作通知。

2025-09-21T10:08:00.CONTENT_EN: Tsui Wah Ferry Service (H. K. ) Limited The kaito ferry service of Sai Kung to Kau Sai Village & High Island which was delayed due to mechanical failure has been resumed.
2025-09-21T10:08:00.CONTENT_CN: 翠華船務（香港）有限公司 較早前因機件故障而延誤的西貢至滘西村及糧船灣的街渡服務現已恢復服務。

2025-09-22T17:47:03.CONTENT_EN:
Transport Department announces at 5:45 pm that due to strong wind condition, the following special traffic arrangement will be implemented on Hong Kong Zhuhai-Macao-Bridge Hong Kong Link Road (HZMB HKLR):

Traffic Arrangement
The HZMB HKLR will be closed at 03:00 pm on 23 September 2025, and all vehicles will be prohibited to enter. 


Transport Department Advice
- Drivers are requested to drive with care and pay attention to the direction of the Police or the Management, Operation and Maintenance (MOM) Contractor of HyD. 
- Members of the public are advised to pay attention to radio / TV announcements and TD’s App e-Mobility for the latest traffic condition.
2025-09-22T17:47:03.CONTENT_CN:
:因強風關係，港珠澳大橋香港連接路將實施下列特別交通安排:

交通安排
港珠澳大橋香港連接路將會於二零二五年九月二十三日下午3 時00 分起封閉，及禁止車輛使用。


運輸署公告
-駕駛人士請盡量忍讓及留意警務人員或路政署的服務承辦商指示。
-公眾人士請留意電視/電台交通消息廣播及運輸署流動應用程式「香港出行易」有關最新交通消息。

2025-09-22T19:32:00.CONTENT_EN: As informed by Mainland Railway Authorities, High Speed Rail train service between Hong Kong and the Mainland after 18:00 on 23 Sep 2025 and on 24 Sep 2025 have been cancelled due to expected adverse weather conditions. For ticket refunds, please refer to the High Speed Rail website and process within the time stated. Please use the 12306 official website (12306. cn) or mobile app and there is no need to rush to Hong Kong West Kowloon Station.
2025-09-22T19:32:00.CONTENT_CN: 內地鐵路單位通報，由於預期天氣情況惡劣，2025年9月23日由18:00之後及2025年9月24日所有來往香港及內地的高速鐵路列車班次取消。 如需退票，請參閱高速鐵路網頁並於指定日期內辦理。請盡量使用12306官方網站(12306.cn)或手機應用程式，不用急於到香港西九龍站辦理。

2025-09-23T12:30:00.CONTENT_EN:
Due to Tropical Cyclone, the service of cross-boundary bus will be adjusted as follows:

Lok Ma Chau Control Point
The Lok Ma Chau – Huanggang Cross-boundary Shuttle Bus Service will continue to provide normal service for at least two hours after the signal is hoisted, with enhanced frequency if necessary. Afterward, the Shuttle Bus service will operate at 30-minute intervals. Service adjustments may be made depending on weather or road conditions. 
.
2025-09-23T12:30:00.CONTENT_CN:
因受熱帶氣旋影響，跨境巴士服務安排如下：

落馬洲管制站
落馬洲-皇崗過境穿梭巴士服務會維持正常服務至八號信號生效後最少兩小時，並在有需要時加密班次，其後班次會調整至每三十分鐘一班。若因應天氣或路面狀況，服務有需要進一步調整。
。

2025-09-23T13:36:00.CONTENT_EN: Due to inclement weather, the following pedestrian subways at Tai Chung Kiu Road and Lion Rock Tunnel Road have been closed by Highway Department: Across Lion Rock Tunnel Road NS16(near the Riverpark) Across Tai Chung Kiu Road NS25(near Tsang Tai Uk) Pedestrians please take note of the above arrangement, and consider using other roads.
2025-09-23T13:36:00.CONTENT_CN: 因惡劣天氣，路政署已封閉以下位於⼤涌橋路與獅子山隧道公路的⾏⼈隧道: 橫過獅子山隧道公路 NS16(近溱岸8號) 橫過⼤涌橋路 NS25(近曾大屋) ⾏⼈請注意上述安排，並改⽤其他道路。
